8.eng-name: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Witr

hadiths.text: Ali b. Abi Talib said:When the Prophet (ﷺ) uttered salutation at the end of the prayer, he used to say: "O Allah, forgive me my former and latter sins, what I have kept secret and what I have done openly, and what I have done extravagance; and what You know better than I do. You are the Advancer, the Delayer, there is no god but You

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ الرَّجُلُ إِذَا سَلَّمَ
chapter.eng-name: What A Person Should Say When He Says The Taslim
